text: James Carson Gardner (born April 8, 1933) is an American businessman and Republican politician. He was a U.S. Representative from 1967 through 1969 and as the 30th Lieutenant Governor of North Carolina from 1989 through 1993. Gardner was born in Rocky Mount, North Carolina. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Rocky Mount, North Carolina Category:Lieutenant Governors of North Carolina
title: Jim Gardner (politician)
